import React from 'react'; import '../Styles/About.css'; // Ensure you have this CSS file for styling function About() { return (

Introducing OpenStove:

A Curated Collection of Community-Crafted Recipes

Explore a growing repository of culinary delights, meticulously organized and shared through GitHub contributions.

Hello to all who love cooking!

OpenStove is more than just a recipe website; it's a place where cooking enthusiasts can come together to share their favorite recipes without any annoying ads or fees — completely free.

Born from the belief that cooking should be distraction-free and without commercial intrusions, OpenStove thrives on the simplicity of sharing recipes. No ads, no paywalls — just direct access to a treasure trove of dishes curated and cherished by an ever-growing community of food lovers.

Frequently Asked Questions

Just head over to the 'Recipes' page. You can browse through the curated collection or use our search functionality to find something specific. Whether you're after a comfort food classic or a daring new dish, our library is at your fingertips.

If you're passionate about your culinary creations and wish to share them with the community, simply submit a pull request through our GitHub repository. Make sure to follow the recipe format guidelines with Astro's collections and markdown files. Once reviewed, your recipe will be added to OpenStove for everyone to savor.

Basic knowledge of Git and Markdown formatting is helpful for submitting recipes. However, we've made our guidelines clear and accessible to guide you through the process. If you need help, our community is always here to assist!

Absolutely! You can bookmark your favorite recipes for quick access during your future visits. Just click the bookmark icon on any recipe page to save it. All your bookmarked recipes will be available under the 'Saved Recipes' section, which you can view anytime. Your favorites are saved locally in your browser, so there's no need for an account or sign-up.

OpenStove is a no-nonsense, zero-ad recipe database that's powered by the culinary community. It's all about the content — crisp, clear, and straight to the plate. Plus, our open-source approach means anyone can contribute and access recipes without any commercial gatekeeping.

Yes, OpenStove is completely free and accessible to everybody. There are no hidden fees or premium content — our goal is to make cooking knowledge universally available.
OpenStove is your kitchen away from the kitchen — a place to discover, save, and share what's cooking. So what are you waiting for? Come join in, click through our recipes, and let's whip up some delicious journeys together at OpenStove!
); } export default About;
